#summary Information about updating the PMTK3 documentation

Documentation for PMTK3 is generated by the following scripts. See [http://code.google.com/p/pmtk3/source/browse/#svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools  /misc/metatools/docTools] for supporting files.

  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/publishDemos.m publishDemos]
  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generateAuthorReport.m generateAuthorReport]
  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generatePmtkStats.m generatePmtkStats]
  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generateSynopses.m generateSynopses]
  * [http://pmtkdata.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/generatePmtkDataTable.m generatePmtkDataTable]
  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/debugDemos.m debugDemos]
